system.login-banner: Be aware that the actions you take can have legal consequences. This system is authorized use by authorized persons only. Usage of this system is monitored for illegal or otherwise illicit traffic, and users should have no expectation of privacy while using this system.

entry.name: Deny International
entry.description:
Lab 11 - Denying International Attackers
Why not try and stop international attackers during CCDC :)
